odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 2-C (YRG2-C), Records documenting Yale legal affairs.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted to the office of origin only.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced asofficial business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyrightstatus for other collection materials is unknown. prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: General Counsel, Yale University, Records (RU 128). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged anddescribed at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does nofurther arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Therecords consist of correspondence, litigation files, research files, subject files, reports, court transcripts, and printed matter detailing the work of the general counsel's office at Yale University.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.
